title: Simon Thomas' girlfriend Derrina Jebb blasts claims she's dating him for money
text:
Simon Thomas went public with new girlfriend Derrina Jebb recently (Picture: Backgrid)

Simon Thomas went public with new girlfriend Derrina Jebb recently, following the tragic death of wife Gemma in 2017.

But the 28-year-old has been trolled over their relationship, with an Instagram user claiming she’s only dating the Sky Sports presenter for his money.

Taking to Instagram, the dad-of-one shared an adorable snap of Derrina and his son, Ethan, having a whale of a time in a swimming pool in Dorset.

Alongside the snap, the 46-year-old wrote: ‘Lashing with rain, wind howling; but the #spa at @silverlakedorset is amazing.

‘Something very liberating about having a dip in a heated outdoor pool in the rain. @derrinajebb @habitat_escapes.’

However, one of his 99,300 followers took a second to comment on the picture in question, claiming his girlfriend was benefiting from him.

‘She’s doing alright out of you,’ they posted.

Derrina was having none of it, hitting back at the troll, fuming: ‘I earn my own salary and take the boys away too but thanks for taking the time to write a lovely comment.

‘Enjoy your Saturday.’

While Simon jumped in to defend her, adding: ‘You don’t merit a proper response. Blocked.’

Simon Thomas’ wife Gemma died in 2017 (Picture: Rex)

Simon’s wife Gemma tragically died in 2017, just three days after she was diagnosed with leukemia.

And the TV presenter recently opened up about finding love once more, explaining meeting Derrina was ‘unexpected’.

During an appearance on Lorraine, he was full of praise for his current partner, telling the host: ‘Meeting Derrina was unexpected but she has been an incredible woman in terms of loving me when I was broken, and loving me now as I rise up from the ashes.

‘But also for having this remarkable relationship with Ethan.

‘She knows there is not a woman on this planet right now who could ever be his mum again. But she’s become such a significant figure in his life.

‘I love her to bits.’
